description: {"blocks":[{"key":"f0dlc","text":"Protocol for Cloning, plasmid construction, and mutagenesis of LRRK2 and LRRK2-RCKW as done by Leschziner and Reck-Peterson Labs.\n\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5fdhl","text":"Original protocol by David Snead  and Yu Xuan Lin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"bpo0i","text":"Materials","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"99m2d","text":"Q5 Site-Directed Mutagenesis (NEB)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d1vat","text":"DH5α competent cells.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ukqd","text":"QIAprep Spin Miniprep Kit (Qiagen)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5eqse","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b3a19","text":"Equipment","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b0aoc","text":"Thermocycler","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e8jck","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1qh78","text":"The DNA coding for LRRK2-RCKW residues 1327 to 2527 (taken from Mammalian Gene Collection) was PCR-amplified using the forward primer TACTTCCAATCCATGAAAA491AGGCTGTGCCTTATAACCGA and the reverse primer TATCCACCTTTACTGTCACTCAACAGATGTTCGTCTCATTTTTTCA. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"abbkt","text":"The DNA coding for LRRK2 was codon-optimized for Spodoptera frugipera (Sf9) cells and synthesized by Epoch Life Science.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":49,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"vfcu","text":"The DNA for either LRRK2 and LRRK2-RCKW, containing a N-terminal His6-Z-tag and TEV protease cleavage site, was cloned into a pFB-6HZB vector (SGC) by ligation-independent cloning, RRID:Addgene_53641 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":142,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fmhrl","text":"LRRK2 variants were generated using Q5 Site-Directed Mutagenesis Kit (NEB).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"436tb","text":"PCR products were subject to a KLD reaction (NEB), followed by a transformation into DH5α competent cells and plated on LB with antibiotics.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9nu26","text":"Colonies were picked and grown overnight for DNA extraction using Qiagen miniprep kit.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7t6eb","text":"Extracted DNA plasmids were submitted for sequencing. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3gmot","text":"The resulting plasmids were utilized for the generation of recombinant Baculoviruses according to the Bac-to-Bac expression system protocol (Invitrogen). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
